title: Is 118 movie hit or flop? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is a hit movie ?? Any movie which recovers all the money invested by exhibitors(theater owners) is known as a hit movie. 118 was made with a tight budget and sold to distributors and exhibitors for 9.5–10crores (approx) and recovered 10.5 crores share(excluding taxes). Hence 118 is a hit venture and a much needed break for Kalyanram

118 a telugu movie directed by k.v guhan starred kalyan ram, niveditha thomas and shalini pandey praised for its unique theme and concept considered as Hit and a good flick But in terms of boxoffice doability its a loss
